name: Scene 1
line: Marlin and Coral's New Life/Barracuda Attack/Nemo

name: Coral
line: Yes, Marlin. No, I see it. It’s beautiful!

name: Marlin
line: So, Coral, when you said you wanted an ocean view, you didn’t think that we we’re gonna get the whole ocean, did you? Huh? [Sighs] Oh yeah. A fish can breath out here. Did your man deliver or did he deliver?

name: Coral
line: Because a lot of other clownfish had their eyes on this place.

name: Marlin
line: You better believe they did-- every single one of them.

name: Coral
line: Mm-hmm. You did good. And the neighborhood is awesome!

name: Marlin
line: So, you do like it, don’t you?

name: Coral
line: No, no. I do, I do! I really do like it. But Marlin, I know that the drop off is desirable, with the great schools and the amazing view, and all, but do we really need so much space?

name: Marlin
line: Coral, honey, these are our kids we’re talking about. They deserve the best. Look, look, look. They’ll wake up, poke their little heads out, and they see a whale! See, right by their bedroom window.

name: Coral
line: Shh! You’re gonna wake the kids.

name: Coral
line: Aw, look! They’re dreaming. We still have to name them.

name: ​Marlin
line: You wanna name all of them, right now? All right, we’ll name this half Marlin Jr. and then this half Coral Junior. OK, we’re done!

name: Marlin
line: Nemo? Well, we’ll name one Nemo, but I’d like most of them to be Marlin Jr.

name: Coral
line: Just think that in a couple of days, we’re going to be parents!

name: Marlin
line: Yeah. What if they don’t like me?

name: Coral
line: There’s over 400 eggs. Odds are, one of them is bound to like you.

name: Marlin
line: Well, I remember. "Excuse me, miss, can you check and see if there’s a hook in my lip?"

name: Marlin
line: Well, you gotta look a little closer because it’s wiggling.

name: Marlin
line: Here he is! Cutie’s here! Where did everybody go? Coral, get inside the house. No, Coral, don’t. They’ll be fine. Just get inside. You. Right now.

name: Marlin
line: No!! Ow! [Marlin groaning] Coral!!! Coral? [gasps] Coral?! [crying] There, there, there. It’s OK, Daddy’s here. Daddy’s got you. I promise, I will never let anything happen to you, Nemo.

name: Nemo
line: First day of school! First day of school! Wake up, wake up! Come on, first day of school!

name: Marlin
line: I don’t want to go to school. Five more minutes.

name: Nemo
line: Get up, get up! It’s time for school! It’s time for school! It’s time for school! It’s time for school! Oh, boy! Oh, boy! Oh boy--whoa!

name: Marlin
line: All right, I’m up. It's time for school. Nemo!

name: Marlin
line: [gasps] Nemo, don't move! Don't move! You'll never get out of there yourself. I'll do it. All right, where's the break? You feel a break?

name: Marlin
line: Sometimes you can’t tell ‘cause fluid is rushing to the area. Now, any rushing fluids?

name: Marlin
line: Are you woozy? How many stripes do I have?

name: Marlin
line: Answer the stripe question! No! See, something’s wrong with you. I have one, two, three that’s all I have? You're OK. How’s the lucky fin?

name: Marlin
line: Are you sure you wanna go to school this year? 'Cause there's no problem if you don't. You can wait five or six years.

name: Nemo
line: Come on, Dad! It’s time for school.

name: Marlin
line: Do you want this anemone to sting you?

name: Marlin
line: There! [laughing] Right there. And here and here and here!

name: Marlin
line: All right, we’re excited. First day of school, here we go. We’re ready to learn to get some knowledge. Now, what’s the one thing we have to remember about the ocean?

name: Marlin
line: That’s my boy. So, first we check to see that the coast is clear. We go out and back in. And then we go out, and back in. And then one more time. Out and back in. And sometimes, if you want a do it four times...

name: Nemo
line: Dad, maybe while I’m at school, I’ll see a shark!

name: Nemo
line: Have you ever met a shark?

name: Marlin
line: No, and I don’t plan to.

name: Nemo
line: Sandy Plankton from next door, he said that sea turtles, [stammers] said that they live to be about a 100 years old!

name: Marlin
line: Well, you know what, if I ever meet a sea turtle, I'll ask him. After I'm done talking to the shark, okay? Whoa, whoa, whoa! Hold on, hold on, wait to cross. Hold my fin, hold my fin.

name: Nemo
line: Dad, you’re not gonna freak out like you did at the petting zoo, are you?

name: Marlin
line: Hey, that snail was about to charge. Hmm, I wonder where we're supposed to go.

name: Fish Mom
line: I’ll pick you up after school.

name: Crab Kid
line: Come on, you guys. Stop it! Give it back!

name: Marlin
line: Come on, we’ll try over there.

name: Marlin
line: Excuse me, is this where we meet his teacher?

name: Bob
line: Well, look who’s out of the anemone.

name: Bill
line: Bill. ...Hey, you’re a clownfish! You’re funny, right? Hey, tell us a joke!

name: Marlin
line: Well, actually, that’s a common misconception. Clownfish are no funnier than any other fish.

name: Marlin
line: All right, I know one joke. There’s a mollusk, see? And he walks up to a sea, well he doesn’t walk up, he swims up. Well, actually the mollusk isn’t moving. He’s in one place and then the sea cucumber, well they I mixed up. There was a mollusk and a sea cucumber. None of them were walking, so forget that I..

name: Bob
line: Sheldon! Get out of Mr. Johanson’s yard, now!!

name: Mr. Johanson
line: All right, you kids! Where’d you go?

name: Nemo
line: Dad, can I go play too? Can I?

name: Marlin
line: I would feel better if you go play over on the sponge beds.

name: Bob
line: Be nice! It’s his first time at school.

name: Marlin
line: He was born with it, kids. We call it his lucky fin.

name: Pearl
line: See this tentacle? It’s actually shorter than all my other tentacles but you can’t really tell.Especially when I twirl them like this.

name: Mr. Ray
line: [singing] Oh... Let’s name the zones, the zones, the zones. Let’s name the zones of the open sea.

name: Mr. Ray
line: Mesopolagic, bathyal, abyssalpelagic. All the rest are too deep for you and me to see. Huh? I wonder where my class has gone.

name: Mr. Ray
line: There you are. Climb aboard, explorers! [singing] Knowledge exploring is oh so lyrical, when you think thoughts that are empirical.

name: Mr. Ray
line: Well, Nemo, all new explorers must answer a science question.

name: Mr. Ray
line: You live in what kind of home?

name: Mr. Ray
line: OK, OK, don’t hurt yourself. Welcome aboard, explorers!

name: Marlin
line: Just so you know, he’s got a little fin. I find if he’s having trouble swimming, let him take a break, 10, 15 minutes.

name: Nemo
line: Dad, it’s time for you to go now.

name: Mr. Ray
line: Don’t worry. We’re gonna stay together as a group. OK, class, optical orbits up front! And remember, we keep our supraesophogeal ganglion to ourselves, that means you, Jimmy.

name: Bob
line: Hey, you’re doing pretty well for a first timer.

name: Marlin
line: Well, you can’t hold onto them forever, can you?

name: Bill
line: I had a tough time when my oldest went out at the Drop Off.

name: Marlin
line: They just gotta grow up... The Drop Off?! They’re going to the Drop Off?! What are you, insane?! Why don’t we fry them up now and serve them with chips?!

name: Marlin
line: Don’t tell me to be calm, pony boy!

name: Bill
line: You know for a clownfish, he really isn't that funny.

name: Mr. Ray
line: [singing] Oh, let’s name the species, the species, the species. Let’s name the species that live in the sea. There’s porifera, coelenterata, hydrozoa, scyphozoa, anthozoa, ctenophora, bryozoas, three! Gastropoda, arthropoda, echinoderma, and some fish like you and me. Come on, sing with me. Just the girls this time. Seaweed is cool. Seaweed is fun. It makes it’s food with the rays of the sun…

name: Mr. Ray
line: OK, the drop off. All right, kids, feel free to explore but stay close. [gasps] Stromalitic cyanobacteria! Gather! An entire ecosystem contained in one infinitesimal speck. There are as many protein pairs contained in this…

name: Mr. Ray
line: Come on, sing with me! [singing] There’s porifera, coelentera, hydrozoa, scyphozoa, anthozoa, ctenophora, bryozoas, three!

name: Pearl
line: [inks] Aahh, you guys made me ink!

name: Tad
line: I know what that is. Sandy Plankton saw one. He called, he said it was called a butt!

name: Pearl
line: Wow! That’s a pretty big butt.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, look at me. I’m gonna go touch the butt! [sneezes] Whoa!! [laughter] Oh, yeah? Let’s see you get closer.

name: Tad
line: Come on, Nemo. How far can you go?

name: Nemo
line: Oh, um... my dad says it’s not safe.

name: Marlin
line: You were about to swim into open water!

name: Nemo
line: No, I wasn’t go out! But dad...

name: Marlin
line: It was a good thing I was here. If I hadn’t showed up, I don’t know...

name: Marlin
line: This does not concern you, kids. And you’re lucky I don’t tell your parents you were out there. You know you can’t swim well!

name: Nemo
line: I can swim fine, dad, OK?

name: Marlin
line: No, it’s not OK. You shouldn’t be anywhere near here! OK, I was right. You know what?You’ll start school in a year or two. [starts to take Nemo away]

name: Nemo
line: [jerks out of his grasp] No, Dad! Just because you’re scared of the ocean...

name: Marlin
line: Clearly, you’re not ready. And you’re not coming back until you are. You think you can do these things but you just can’t, Nemo!

name: Mr. Ray
line: [singing] There’s. Nothing to see. Gather, over there. Excuse me, is there anything I can do? I am a scientist, sir. Is there any problem?

name: Marlin
line: I’m sorry. I didn’t mean to interrupt things. He isn’t a good swimmer. I just think it’s a little too soon for him to be out here unsupervised.

name: Mr. Ray
line: Well, I can assure you, he’s quite safe with me.

name: Marlin
line: Look, I’m sure he is. But you have a large class and he can get lost from sight if you’re not looking. I’m not saying you’re not looking...

name: Kathy
line: Oh, my gosh! Nemo’s swimming out to sea!

name: Marlin
line: (gasps) Nemo!!! What do you think you’re doing?!

name: Marlin
line: You’re gonna get stuck out there, and I’ll have to get you before another fish does! Get back here!

name: Marlin
line: I said get back here, now!! Stop!

name: Marlin
line: You take one more move, mister...!

name: Marlin
line: D-Don’t you dare! If you put one fin on that boat— Are you listening to me?! Don’t touch the boa...!

name: Marlin
line: You just paddle your little tail back here, Nemo! That’s right! You are in big trouble, young man! Do you hear me? Big...!

name: Marlin
line: I’m coming, Nemo!! (tries to save Nemo but another diver appears)

name: Marlin
line: No!!! (whimpering) NEMO!!! (swimming too fast) Nemo!!! (a diver flashes him.) No!!! Nemo!!!

name: Marlin
line: (panting) Oh, no! No, no! It’s gone, it’s gone! No, no, it can’t be gone! No, no!! Nemo!!! No, please, no!!! No, no!! Has anybody seen a boat?! Please!!! A white boat!!! They took my son!!! My son!!! Help me, please!!!

name: Dory
line: Sorry! I didn’t see you. Sir, are you OK? There, there. It’s all right.

name: Marlin
line: No, no! They took him away! I have to find the boat!

name: Dory
line: A boat? Hey, I’ve seen a boat!

name: Dory
line: It passed by not too long ago.

name: Dory
line: It went, this way! And it went this way! Follow me!

name: Marlin
line: Thank you! Thank you, so much!

name: Dory
line: I’m trying to swim here! What, ocean ain’t big enough for you? You got a problem, buddy? Do you? You want a piece of me? Yeah, I’m scared now. What!

name: Marlin
line: What are talking about? You’re showing me which way the boat went!

name: Dory
line: A boat? Hey, I’ve seen a boat. It passed by not too long ago. It went this way, it went this way. Follow me!

name: Marlin
line: Wait a minute!! What is going on?! You already told me which way the boat was going!

name: Marlin
line: If this is some kind of practical joke, it’s not funny! And I know funny... I’m a clownfish!

name: Dory
line: No, it’s not. I know it’s not. I’m so sorry. See, I suffer from short-term memory loss.

name: Marlin
line: Short-term memory loss. I don’t believe this!

name: Dory
line: No, it’s true. I forget things almost instantly. It runs in my family. Or at least I think it does. Where are they? Can I help you?

name: Marlin
line: Something’s wrong with you, really. You’re wasting my time. I have to find my son.

name: Bruce
line: Name’s Bruce! It’s all right, I understand. Why trust a shark, right? [laughing] So, what’s a couple of bites like you doing out so late?

name: Marlin
line: Nothing. We’re not doing anything. We’re not even out.

name: Bruce
line: Great! Then how’d you morsels like to come to a little get-together I’m having?

name: Bruce
line: Yeah, right a party! What do you say?

name: Dory
line: I love parties! That like sounds fun!

name: Marlin
line: Parties are fun, and it’s tempting but can't because...

name: Dory
line: Hey, look. Balloons! It is a party!

name: Bruce
line: [chuckling] Mind your distance, though. Those balloons can be a bit dodgy. You wouldn’t want one of them to pop.

name: Chum
line: We’ve already gone through all the snacks and I’m still starving!

name: Anchor
line: We almost had a feeding frenzy.

name: Chum
line: Come on, let’s get this over with!

name: Bruce
line: Right, then. The meeting has officially come to order. Let us all say the pledge..

name: All
line: I am a nice shark, not a mindless eating machine. If I am to change this image, I must first change myself. Fish are friends, not food.

name: Chum
line: Dolphins. Yeah! They think they’re so cute. "Look at me. I’m a flipping little dolphin! Let me flip for you. Ain’t I something?"

name: Bruce
line: Right, then. Today’s meeting is step five. Bring a Fish Friend. Now, do you all have your friends?

name: Chum
line: Well, I seem to have misplaced my friend.

name: Bruce
line: That’s all right, Chum. I had a feeling this would be a difficult step, you can help yourself to one of my friends.

name: Chum
line: Thanks, mate. A little chum for Chum, eh?

name: Bruce
line: I’ll start the testimonies. Hello, my name is Bruce.

name: Bruce
line: It has been three weeks since my last fish, on my honor, or may I be chopped up and made into soup.

name: Chum
line: You’re an inspiration to all of us!

name: Bruce
line: Yes, the little Sheila down the front!

name: Dory
line: And... Well, I don’t think I’ve ever eaten a fish.

name: Dory
line: I’m glad I got that off my chest.

name: Bruce
line: All right, anyone else? Hello, how ‘bout you, mate? What’s your problem?

name: Marlin
line: Me? I don’t have a problem.

name: Marlin
line: OK. Uh, hello. My name is Marlin. I’m a clownfish.

name: Bruce
line: Go on! Tell us a joke!

name: Marlin
line: Well, I actually I do know one that’s pretty good. There was this mollusk and he walks up to a sea cucumber. Normally, they don’t talk, sea cucumbers, but in a joke, everyone talks. So the sea mollusk says to the cucumber…

name: Bruce
line: For a clownfish, he’s not that funny.

name: Marlin
line: No, no, no, no, he’s my son. He was taken by these divers.

name: Bruce
line: [tearfully] Now there is a father looking for his little boy!

name: Marlin
line: Ugh! What do these markings mean?

name: Dory
line: Well then we gotta find a fish who can read this. Hey, look, sharks! Guys!

name: Marlin
line: No, no, no, Dory! Cut it out!

name: Dory
line: That’s mine! Give it to me! Ow!!!

name: Marlin
line: I’m sorry. Are you OK? I'm so sorry.

name: Dory
line: You really clocked me there. Am I bleeding?

name: Bruce
line: Dory, are you OK... [sniffs] Oh! That’s good...!

name: Chum
line: Remember, Bruce, fish are friends, not food!

name: Marlin
line: There’s no way out! There’s got to be a way to escape!

name: Marlin
line: Dory, help me find a way out!

name: Dory
line: Sorry, you’ll have to come back later. We’re trying to escape.

name: Marlin
line: OK. There’s gotta be a way out!

name: Dory
line: Look, here’s something! "Es-cap-e." I wonder what that means. It’s funny, it’s spelled just like the word "escape."

name: Marlin
line: Wait a minute. You can read?

name: Dory
line: I can read? That’s right! I can read!

name: Marlin
line: Well, then here! Read this now!

name: Anchor
line: He really doesn’t mean it, you know! He never even knew his father!!

name: Marlin
line: I need to get that mask!

name: Marlin
line: No, no, no, no, no, no!!! Quick, grab the mask! Grab it!!

name: Dr. Phillip Sherman
line: Barbara? Prep for his anterior crown, would you, please? And I’m going to need a few cotton rolls.

name: Dr. Phillip Sherman
line: [chuckling] Beauty, isn’t he? I found that guy struggling for life out on the reef and I saved him. So, has that Novocaine kicked in yet?

name: Bloat
line: Slow down, little fella. There’s nothing to worry about.

name: Nemo
line: I want to go home! Do you know where my dad is?

name: Peach
line: Honey, your dad’s probably back at the pet store.

name: Bloat
line: Yeah. Like I’m from Bob’s Fish Mart.

name: Gurgle
line: Ah, the ocean. The ocean!!! Aagghh!!!! He hasn’t been decontaminated yet! Jacques! Clean him!

name: Jacques
line: La mer. Bon. Voila. He is clean!

name: Bubbles
line: Wow. The big blue. What’s it like?

name: Deb
line: Kid, if there’s anything you need, just ask your auntie Deb, that’s me! Or if I’m not around, you can always talk to my sister Flo. Hi, how are you? Don’t listen to anything my sister says, she’s nuts!

name: Peach
line: I said we got a live one.

name: Peach
line: Root canal. And by the looks of those X-rays. It’s not gonna be pretty.

name: Gurgle
line: What did he use to open?

name: Peach
line: Gator-Glidden drill. He seems to be favoring that one lately.

name: Peach
line: Now, he’s doing the Schilder technique.

name: Gurgle
line: That’s not a Hedstrom file. That’s a K-Flex.

name: Bloat
line: It’s got a teardrop cross-section. Clearly a Hedstrom.

name: Bloat
line: Hedstrom! There I go! A little help over here?

name: Shereman
line: All right, go ahead and rinse.

name: Gurgle
line: Ugh! The human mouth is a disgusting place.

name: Nigel
line: What did I miss? Am I late?

name: Peach
line: Root canal, and it’s a doozy.

name: Nigel
line: Root canal. What did he use to open?

name: Nigel
line: He seems to be favoring that one. Hope he doesn’t get surplus sealer at the portal terminus. Hello! Who’s this?

name: Gurgle
line: The dentist took him off the reef.

name: Nigel
line: An outie. From my neck of the woods? Sorry if I ever took a snap at you. Fish gotta swim, birds gotta eat.

name: Sherman
line: Hey! No, no! They’re aren't your fish! They’re my fish! Come on! Go on! Shoo! Shoo! The picture broke. This here’s Darla. She’s my niece. She’s going to be eight next week. Hey, little fella. Say hello to your new mummy. She’ll be here Friday to pick you up. You’re her present. Shh! It’s our little secret. Well, Mr. Tucker, while that sets up I’m going to see a man about a wallaby.

name: Gurgle
line: She wouldn’t stop shaking the bag.

name: Deb
line: He was her present last year.

name: Bloat
line: Hitched a ride on the porcelain express.

name: Nemo
line: I can’t go with that girl! I have to get back to my dad! Aah!!! Daddy!!! Help me!!!

name: Gill
line: No. You got yourself in there, you can get yourself out.

name: Gill
line: I just wanna see him do it, okay? Calm down. Alternate wiggling your fins and your tail.

name: Nemo
line: I can’t. I have a bad fin!

name: Gill
line: Never stopped me. Just think about what you need to do.

name: Peach
line: Wow. From the ocean. Just like you, Gill.

name: Peach
line: [chuckles] I’ve seen that look before. What are you thinking about?

name: Gill
line: I’m thinking, tonight, we give the kid a proper reception.

name: Bloat
line: OK, kid you got a name or what?

name: Dory
line: Are you gonna eat that? [snoring] ...Careful with that hammer.

name: Marlin
line: No, no! What does it say? Dory!

name: Marlin
line: Wake up!! Get up! Come on! Come on!!

name: Marlin
line: The mask! Where’s the mask?! No!!! Not the mask!! Get it! Get the mask! Get it!! [panting]

name: Dory
line: [humming] Whoo-hoo! Just keeps going on, doesn’t it? Echo! Echo! What are you doing?

name: Marlin
line: It’s gone! I’ve lost the mask.

name: Marlin
line: You dropped it!! That was my only chance of finding my son, now it’s gone!

name: Dory
line: Hey, Mr. Grumpy Gills. When life gets you down, you know what you gotta do?

name: Marlin
line: I don’t want to know what you gotta do.

name: Dory
line: [singing] Just keep swimming. What do we do? We swim.

name: Dory
line: I love to swim! When you want to swim...

name: Marlin
line: See, I’m going to get stuck now with that song now it’s in my head!

name: Marlin
line: Who could it be? It’s me!

name: Marlin
line: Yeah. I’m your conscience. We haven’t spoken for a while. How are you?

name: Marlin
line: Good. Now, Dory. I want you to tell me..do you see anything?

name: Dory
line: I see... I see a light.

name: Dory
line: Yeah. Over there. Hey, conscience. Am I dead?

name: Marlin
line: No, I see it too. What is it?

name: Marlin
line: Hi, I’m feeling happy. Which is a big deal for me.

name: Dory
line: I want to touch it. Oh!

name: Marlin
line: Hey, come back. Come on back here!

name: Dory
line: [singing] I’m gonna get you. I’m gonna get you. I’m gonna swim with you.

name: Marlin
line: I’m gonna get you. I’m gonna be your best friend, good feeling’s gone.

name: Marlin
line: I can’t see!!! I don’t know where I’m going!!! The mask!!!

name: Dory
line: What mask? OK, I can’t see a thing.

name: Dory
line: I’m sorry, but if you could just bring it a little closer, I kind of need the light. That’s great, keep it right there.

name: Dory
line: OK, OK. Mr. Bossy. P’. OK, ‘P. Sher…P. Shirley? P not Shirley. The first line’s ‘P. Sherman’!

name: Marlin
line: P. Sherman doesn’t make any sense!!!

name: Dory
line: Light, please. The second line’s ‘42 Wallaby Way’!

name: Marlin
line: That’s great! Speed read!!! Take a guess! No pressure!!!! No problem! There’s a lot of pressure! Pressure!!!! Take a guess now with pressure!!

name: Marlin
line: Duck! [pants] I’m dead, I’m dead, I’m dead, I’m dead, I’m dead, I died, I’m dead. Whoo-hoo! [singing] We did it! Oh, yeah! No eating here tonight, whoo!

name: Dory
line: No, eating here tonight. You on a diet.

name: Marlin
line: Dory! What did the mask say?

name: Dory
line: "P. Sherman, 42 Wallaby Way, Sydney". [gasps] I remember what it said! I usually forget things, but I remembered it this time!

name: Dory
line: I don’t know. But who cares? I remembered!

name: Dory
line: P. Sherman, 42 Wallaby Way, Sydney. I remembered it again!!

name: Bloat
line: Nemo! Newcomer of orange and white, you have been called forth to the summit of Mount Wannahockaloogie to join with us in the fraternal bonds of tank-hood.

name: Peach
line: We want you in our club, kid.

name: Bloat
line: If you are able to swim through..The Ring of Fire! Turn on the Ring of Fire. The Ring of Fire, you said you could do it the Ring of Fire!

name: Peach
line: Isn’t there another way?! He’s just a boy!!

name: Gill
line: From this moment on, you will now be known as Sharkbait.

name: Gill
line: OK, Sharkbait’s one of us now, agreed?

name: Gill
line: We can’t send him off to his death. Darla’s coming in 5 days, so what are we gonna do? I’ll tell you what we’re gonna do: we’re gonna get him outta here. We’re gonna help him escape,

name: Gurgle
line: Gill, please, not another one of your escape plans.

name: Deb
line: Sorry, but they, they just, they never work.

name: Bloat
line: Yeah. Why should this be any different?

name: Gill
line: You’re the only one who can get in and out of that thing. What we need you to do is take a pebble inside and jam the gears. You do that and this tank’s gonna get filthier and filthier by the minute. Pretty soon, the dentist’ll have to clean the tank himself. And when he does, he’ll take us out of the tank, put us in the individual baggies, then we roll ourselves down the counter, out of the window, off the awning, into the bushes, across the street and into the harbor! It’s foolproof! Who’s with me?

name: Gurgle
line: No offense kid, but, you’re not the best swimmer.

name: Gill
line: He’s fine, he can do this! So Sharkbait, what do you think?

name: Dory
line: I’m going to P. Sherman, 42 Wallaby Way, Sydney. Where are you going? I’m going to P. Sherman, 42 Wallaby Way, Sydney. If you’re asking where I’m going. I’ll tell you that’s where I’m going. It’s P. Sherman, 42 Wallaby Way, Sydney. Where? I’m sorry, I didn’t hear you. P. Sherman, 42 Wallaby Way…

name: Marlin
line: Excuse me... Hi. Do you know how to get to hello? Wait! Can you tell me... Hey! Hold it! Wait a minute! I’m trying to talk to you! OK, fellas, come back here. Please, one quick question. I need to and they’re gone again. [sighing]

name: Dory
line: P. Sherman 42 Wallaby Way, Sydney. Why do I have to tell you over and over again? I’ll tell you again. I don’t get tired of it...

name: Marlin
line: OK, all right. Here’s the thing. You know, I just, think it’s best if I just, if I just, carry on from here by myself.

name: Marlin
line: Without, well, I mean, not without you. I mean, it’s just that I don’t want you, with me.

name: Marlin
line: I don’t want a hurt your feelings..

name: Marlin
line: Well, I mean not. Yes. Yeah. It’s just that you know I just can’t afford anymore delays and you’re one of those fish that cause delays. And sometimes it’s a good thing. There’s a whole group of fish. They’re delay fish.

name: Dory
line: You mean... You mean you don’t like me?

name: Marlin
line: No, of course I like you. It’s because I like you I don’t want a be with you. It’s a complicated emotion.

name: Moonfish Leader
line: Hey, you! Lady, is this guy bothering you?

name: Marlin
line: No. We’re just, we’re..hey, do you guys know how I can get to...

name: Moonfish
line: Look, pal. We’re talking to the lady, not you. Hey, you like impressions?

name: Moonfish
line: OK. Just like in rehearsals, gentlemen. So, what are we? Take a guess.

name: Moonfish
line: I’m a fish with a nose like a sword.

name: Moonfish
line: Hey, clown boy! Let the lady guess. Where’s the butter?

name: Dory
line: It’s on the tip of my tongue.

name: Moonfish
line: Saw that. Lots of legs, lives in the ocean.

name: Moonfish
line: Close enough. [singing] It’s a whale of a tale, I’ll tell you lad, a whale of a tale.

name: Marlin
line: Will somebody please give me directions?!

name: Moonfish
line: [mockingly] Will somebody please give me directions?!

name: Dory
line: Oh, dear. Hey, come back! What’s the matter?

name: Marlin
line: What’s the matter? While they’re doing their silly little impressions, I am miles from home, with a fish that can’t even remember her own name.

name: Marlin
line: Meanwhile my son is out there.

name: Dory
line: You’re son Chico? Right. Got it.

name: Marlin
line: Nemo. But it doesn’t matter, ‘cause no fish in this entire ocean is gonna help me!

name: Dory
line: Well, I’m helping you. Wait right here. Hey, guys.

name: Moonfish
line: What, is he bothering you again?

name: Dory
line: No, he’s a good guy. Go easy on him, he’s lost his son, Fabio. Any of you heard of P. Sherman, 42 Wallaby Way, Sydney?

name: Moonfish
line: Sydney? Sure. Why, Ted here’s got relatives in Sydney. Don’t you, Ted?

name: Dory
line: They know Sydney! You wouldn’t know how to get there, would you?

name: Moonfish
line: What you wanna do is follow the EAC, that’s the East Australian Current. Big current, can’t miss it, it’s in..that direction. And then you gotta follow that for about, I don’t know, what do you guys think? About three leagues? And that little baby’s gonna put you right past Sydney.

name: Marlin
line: Great!!! That’s great! Dory, you did it!!

name: Dory
line: Oh, please. I’m just your little helper. Helping along, that’s me.

name: Moonfish
line: Don’t mention it. And, loosen up. OK, buddy?

name: Dory
line: You guys. You really nailed him. Bye.

name: Moonfish
line: When you come to this trench, swim through it, not over it.

name: Dory
line: Trench, through it, not over it. I’ll remember. Hey, wait up, partner. Hold on. Wait! Wait-wait! I got, I gotta tell you something. Whoa. Nice trench. Hello! [echoing] OK, let’s go.

name: Marlin
line: Bad trench! Come on, we’re gonna swim over this thing.

name: Dory
line: Partner. Little red flag going up. Something telling me we should swim through it, not over it.

name: Marlin
line: Are you even looking at this thing? It’s got death written all over it!

name: Dory
line: I’m sorry, but I really, think we should swim through.

name: Marlin
line: And I’m really done talking about this. Over we go.

name: Dory
line: Come on, trust me on this.

name: Dory
line: Yes, trust. It’s what friends do.

name: Marlin
line: It just swam over the trench! Come on, we’ll follow it.

name: Dory
line: OK. Boy, sure is clear up here.

name: Marlin
line: Exactly. And look at that, there’s the current. We should be there in no time.

name: Marlin
line: You wanted to go through the trench.

name: Dory
line: I shall call him Squishy and he shall be mine and he shall be my Squishy. Come here, little Squishy. [Baby talking] Ow!!

name: Marlin
line: Shoo! Get away! Come here, let me see.

name: Dory
line: Don’t touch it! Don’t touch it!

name: Marlin
line: I’m not gonna touch it. I just want a look.

name: Dory
line: How come it didn't sting you?

name: Marlin
line: It did. It’s just that, hold still. I live in this anemone and I’m used to these kind of stings. Come here. It doesn’t look bad, you’re gonna be fine. But now we know, don’t we? That we don’t want a touch these again. Let’s be thankful this time it was just a little one. Don’t move! This is bad, Dory.

name: Marlin
line: Dory! Don’t bounce on the tops! They will not sting you! The tops don’t sting you, that’s it!

name: Dory
line: Two in a row, beat that.

name: Marlin
line: Dory! All right, listen to me. I have an idea, a game.

name: Marlin
line: All right, here’s the game. Whoever can hop the fastest out of these jellyfish, wins.

name: Marlin
line: Rules! You can’t touch the tentacles, only the tops.

name: Dory
line: Something about tentacles, got it. On your mark, get set, go!

name: Marlin
line: Wait! Wait! Not something about them, it’s all about them! Wait! Dory!

name: Dory
line: Gotta go faster if you want a win!

name: Marlin
line: So, we’re cheating death now. That’s what we’re doing. We’re having fun at the same time. I can do this, just be careful.

name: Dory
line: Careful I don’t make you cry when I win!

name: Dory
line: Give it up, old man. You can’t fight evolution, I was built for speed.

name: Marlin
line: The question is, Dory, are you hungry?

name: Marlin
line: Yeah. Cause you’re about to eat my bubbles!! Duck to the left! Right there! The clownfish is the winner!!! We did it! We’re gonna... Dory? Oh, no. Dory!! Dory!! Dory! Dory! [sizzling] [Marlin screaming]

name: Marlin
line: No, you’re doing fine! You’re, you’re actually winning! But you gotta stay awake. Where does P. Sherman live?

name: Marlin
line: That’s it! Stay awake! Stay awake! Stay awake! Stay awake!!!

name: Gill
line: You miss your Dad, don’t you, Sharkbait?

name: Gill
line: Well, you’re lucky to have someone out there who’s looking for you.

name: Nemo
line: He’s not looking for me. He’s scared of the ocean.

name: Peach
line: He’s had at least four cups of coffee, it’s gotta be soon.

name: Gill
line: Keep on him. My first escape, landed on dental tools. I was aimin’ for the toilet.

name: Gill
line: All drains lead to the ocean, kid.

name: Nemo
line: Wow! How many times have you tried to get out?

name: Gill
line: I’ve lost count. Fish aren’t meant to be in a box, kid. It does things to ‘ya.

name: Peach
line: Potty break! Potty break! He just grabbed the Reader’s Digest! We have 4.2 minutes.

name: Gill
line: You gotta be quick. Once you get in, you swim down to the bottom of the chamber and I’ll talk you through the rest.

name: Gill
line: Go on, it’ll be a piece of kelp.

name: Gill
line: Nicely done! Can you hear me?

name: Gill
line: Here comes the pebble. Now, do you see a small opening?

name: Gill
line: OK, inside it you’ll see a rotating fan. Very carefully, wedge that pebble into the fan to stop it turning. Careful, Sharkbait.

name: Peach
line: Gill, this isn’t a good idea.

name: Gill
line: That’s it, Sharkbait. Nice and steady.

name: Nemo
line: I got it! I got it!

name: Gill
line: That’s great, kid! Now, swim up the tube and out.

name: Gurgle
line: What do we do!? What do we do!?

name: Gill
line: Stay calm, kid! Just don’t panic!!

name: Peach
line: Gill, don’t make him go back in there.

name: Crush
line: Dude. Focus, dude. Dude. He lives! Hey, dude!

name: Crush
line: Oh, saw the whole thing, dude. First you were like, ‘whoa’! And then we were all like, ‘whoa’! And then you were like, ‘whoa’.

name: Crush
line: You, mini-man. Taking on the jellies. You got serious thrill issues, dude. Awesome!

name: Crush
line: Oh, man. No hurling on the shell, dude, just waxed it.

name: Crush
line: Dude. Mr. Turtle is my father. Name’s Crush.

name: Marlin
line: Crush? Really? OK, Crush, listen I need to get to the East Australian Current. EAC?

name: Crush
line: [chuckles] Dude, you’re riding it, dude! Check it out! OK, grab shell, dude!

name: Crush
line: So, what brings you on this fine day to the EAC?

name: Marlin
line: Well, Dory and I need to get to Sydney. [gasps] Dory! Is she all right!?

name: Crush
line: Little Blue. She is sub-level, dude.

name: Dory
line: I’m so sorry. This is all my fault.

name: Dory
line: 29, 30! Ready or not, here I come!! There you are! Catch me if you can!! [laughing]

name: Crush
line: Kill the motor, dude. Let us see what Squirt does flying solo.

name: Squirt
line: Whoa!!! That was so cool!! Hey Dad, did you see that?! Did you see me?! Did you see what I did?!

name: Crush
line: You so totally rock, Squirt! So give me some fin, noggin.

name: Marlin
line: Well, apparently, I must’ve done something you all likes dude.

name: Crush
line: Curl away, my son! It’s awesome, Jellyman. Little dudes are just eggs, leave ‘em on the beach to hatch, then coo-coo-ca-choo, they find their way back to the big ‘ol blue.

name: Marlin
line: But, dude . How do you know when they’re ready?

name: Crush
line: Well, you never really know. But when they’ll know, you’ll know, you know?

name: Squirt
line: I know that dude. It’s the Jellyman!

name: Dory
line: Well, go on, jump on him!

name: Marlin
line: Hold on, I need to breath...!

name: Turtle Kid 4
line: Did you really cross the jellyfish forest?

name: Dory
line: Sorry. I was a little vague on the details.

name: Marlin
line: Well, you see my son was taken. My son was taken away from me.

name: Marlin
line: No, kids. I don’t want a talk about it.

name: Marlin
line: Well, OK. I live on this reef, a long long way from here.

name: Dory
line: Oh, boy. This is gonna be good, I can tell.

name: Marlin
line: And my son, Nemo, see he was mad at me. Maybe he wouldn’t have done it if I hadn’t been so tough on him, I don’t know. Anyway, he swam out in the open water to this boat and when he was out there, these divers appeared and I tried to stop them but the boat was too fast. So we swam out in the ocean to follow them…

name: Turtle Kid
line: They couldn’t stop them. And then Nemo’s dad, he swims out to the ocean and they bump into..

name: Small Fish
line: ...three ferocious sharks! He scares away the sharks by blowing them up!

name: Lobster
line: ...feet straight down into the dark. It’s like wicked dark down there, you can‘t see a thing. How’s it going, Bob? And the only thing that they can see down there..

name: Swordfish
line: ...is the light from this big horrible creature with razor sharp teeth. Nice parry, old man. And then he has to blast his way…

name: Dolphin
line: So, these two little fish have been... Searching the ocean for days. On the East Australian Current.

name: Female Bird
line: Which means that he may be on his way here right now. That should put them in Sydney..

name: Male Bird 1
line: ...Harbor in a matter of days. I mean, it sounds like this guy’s gonna stop at..

name: Male Bird 2
line: ...nothing until he finds his son. I sure hope he makes it.

name: Male Bird 3
line: That’s one dedicated father if you ask me.

name: Nigel
line: Would you just shut up?! You’re rats with wings!!

name: Pelican 2
line: ..bloke’s been looking for his boy Nemo. He was taken off the reef by divers and this..

name: Nigel
line: Say that again! You said something about Nemo! What was it?

name: Pelican
line: Last I heard, he’s heading towards the harbor.

name: Gurgle
line: I don’t know, but whatever you do, don’t mention D-A-R..

name: Nemo
line: It’s OK, I know who you’re talking about. Gill? Gill?

name: Nemo
line: I’m sorry I couldn’t stop the...

name: Gill
line: No, I’m the one who should be sorry. I was so ready to get out, so ready to taste that ocean. I was willing to put you in harm’s way to get there. Nothing should be worth that. I’m sorry I couldn’t get you back to your father, kid.

name: Dr. Phillip Sherman
line: Well, that’s one way to pull a tooth. [laughs] Darn kids. Well, good thing I pulled the right one, prime minister?

name: Peach
line: Nigel. You just missed an extraction.

name: Nigel
line: Has he loosened the periodontal ligament yet.. What I’m talking about!? Nemo! Where’s Nemo? I gotta speak with him.

name: Nigel
line: Your dad’s been fighting the entire ocean looking for you.

name: Nigel
line: Oh, yeah. He’s travelled hundreds of miles. He’s been battling sharks and jellyfish and all sorts of...

name: Nigel
line: Are you sure? What was his name? Some sort of sportfish or something: tuna, uh, trout...

name: Nigel
line: That’s it! The little clownfish from the reef.

name: Nemo
line: It’s my dad! He took on a shark!!

name: Nigel
line: I heard he took on three.

name: Nigel
line: You see, kid, after you were taken by diver Dan over there, your dad followed the boat you were on like a maniac.

name: Nigel
line: He’s swimming and he’s swimming and he’s giving it all he’s got and then three gigantic sharks capture him and he blows them up! And then dives thousands of feet and gets chased by a monster with huge teeth! He ties this demon to a rock and what does he get for a reward? He gets to battle an entire jellyfish forest! And now he’s riding with a bunch of sea turtles on the East Australian Current and the word is he’s headed this way right now, to Sydney!!

name: Gill
line: He was looking for you after all, Sharkbait.

name: Gurgle
line: You’ve got your whole life ahead of you!!

name: Gurgle
line: Come on, kid! Grab the end!!

name: Gill
line: Can you hear me, Sharkbait?! Nemo! Can you hear me?!

name: Gill
line: That took guts, kid. All right, gang. We have less than 48 hours before Darla gets here! This tank’ll get plenty dirty in that time but we have to help it along any way we can. Jacques!

name: Gill
line: Everybody else, be as gross as possible. Think dirty thoughts. We’re gonna make this tank so filthy, the dentist’ll have to clean it.

name: Crush
line: All right, we’re here, dudes! Get ready! Your exit’s coming up, man!!

name: Dory
line: Right there! I see it! I see it!!!

name: Marlin
line: You mean the swirling vortex of terror?!

name: Crush
line: OK, first: find your exit buddy! Do you have your exit buddy?!

name: Crush
line: OK, Squirt here will now give you a rundown of proper exiting technique!!

name: Squirt
line: Good afternoon, we’re gonna have a great jump today! OK, crank a hard cutback as you hit the wall! There’s a screaming bottom turn, so watch out! Remember: rip it, roll it and punch it!!

name: Marlin
line: It’s like he’s trying to speak to me, I know it! You know, you’re really cute! But I don’t know what you’re saying! Say the first thing again!

name: Marlin
line: That was fun!! I actually enjoyed that!!

name: Crush
line: Most excellent!! Now, turn your fishy tails ‘round and swim straight on through to Sydney!! No worries, man!

name: Marlin
line: No worries! Thank you, dude Crush!!

name: Crush
line: You tell your little dude I said ‘hi’, OK?!

name: Marlin
line: Nemo, would’ve loved this. Crush, I forgot! How old are you?

name: Crush
line: 150, dude! And still young!! Rock on!

name: Marlin
line: Yep. We’re gonna just swim straight.

name: Dory
line: [singing] Just keep swimming, just keep swimming. [humming]

name: Marlin
line: Dory? Boy, this is taking a while.

name: Dory
line: How about we play a game?

name: Dory
line: OK I’m thinking of something, orange. And it’s small...

name: Dory
line: All righty, Mr. Smarty Pants. Orange and small, and white stripes...

name: Marlin
line: Me! And the next one’s just a guess: me.

name: Marlin
line: Wait, I have definitely seen this floating speck before. That means we’ve passed it before and that means we’re going in circles and that means we’re not going straight!

name: Marlin
line: We gotta get to the surface, come on! Let’s figure it out up there. Let’s go! Follow me! What?

name: Dory
line: Hey! Relax. Take a deep breath. [both inhaling and exhaling] Now, let’s ask somebody for directions.

name: Marlin
line: Fine. Who do you wanna ask, the speck? There’s nobody here!

name: Dory
line: Well, there has to be someone. It’s the ocean, silly, we’re not the only two in here. Let’s see…OK, no one there. Nope. Nada. There’s somebody. Hey! Excuse me.

name: Marlin
line: Dory! OK, now it’s my turn. I’m thinking of something dark and mysterious. It’s a fish we don’t know. And if we ask it directions, it could ingest us and spit out our bones!!

name: Dory
line: What is it with men and asking for directions?

name: Marlin
line: Look, I don’t wanna play the gender card right now. You wanna play a card? Let’s play the ‘Let’s Not Die’ card.

name: Dory
line: You want a get outta here, don’t you?

name: Marlin
line: Of course, I do! But, Dory you don't gracefully understand. [sighs] All right.

name: Dory
line: Well then, how are we gonna do that unless we give it a shot and hope for the best? Come on, trust me on this. Excuse me! Little fella? Hello. Don’t be rude, say ‘hi’.

name: Dory
line: Sydney! Yes. And it’s really, remember that we get there as fast as we can. So can you help us out? Come on, little fella. Come on.

name: Marlin
line: Dory, I’m a little fella. I don’t think that’s a little fella.

name: Dory
line: Oh, a big fella. Big... A whale... okay, Maybe he only speaks whale. [imitating the sound a whale makes] MwOOooo! WwwwEEEE... nEEeeeedd tOOooo FINNND hiIIiiss SONNNNN...

name: Marlin
line: Dory? What are you doing? Are you sure you speak whale?

name: Marlin
line: Dory!! Heaven knows what you're saying! See, he’s swimming away.

name: Marlin
line: He’s not coming back. You offended him!

name: Dory
line: Maybe a different dialect. MOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!! MOOOOOAAAAAAAAAA..!!!

name: Marlin
line: Dory. Dory, this is not whale. You're speaking like..upset stomach.

name: Dory
line: Too much orca. Didn’t it sound a little orca-ish?

name: Marlin
line: It doesn't sound orca. It sounds like nothing I've ever heard!

name: Marlin
line: It’s just as well, he might be hungry.

name: Dory
line: Don’t worry. Whales don’t eat clownfish, they eat krill.

name: Gill
line: Look at that. Would you look at that? Filthy! Absolutely filthy! And it’s all thanks to you, kid. You made it possible.

name: Peach
line: Walks to the counter, drops the keys..

name: Gurgle
line: Don’t you people realize we are swimming in our own--!

name: Dr. Phillip Sherman
line: Crikey, what a state! Oh. Barbara, what’s my earliest appointment tomorrow?

name: Dr. Phillip Sherman
line: Leave it open, would you? I gotta clean the fish tank before Darla gets here.

name: Nemo
line: Yay! He’s gonna clean the tank! He’s gonna clean the tank! We’re gonna be clean!

name: Gill
line: Are you ready to see your dad kid?

name: Gill
line: Of course you are. I wouldn’t be surprised if he’s out there in the harbor waiting for you right now.

name: Scene 14
line: Inside the Whale/Arriving at Sydney Harbor

name: Dory
line: [Dory laughing] Whoo!!! Here comes a big one! Come on, you gotta try this!!

name: Marlin
line: We’re in a whale!! Don’t you get it!?

name: Marlin
line: A WHALE!! ‘Cause you had to ask for help!! And now we’re stuck here!!

name: Dory
line: A whale. You know I speak whale.

name: Marlin
line: No, you’re insane!! You can’t speak whale!!! I have to get out!!! I have to find my son!!! I have to tell him how old sea turtles are!!!

name: Dory
line: [whooping] Hey. You OK? There, there. It’s all right. It’ll be OK.

name: Marlin
line: No. I promised him I’d never let anything happen to him!

name: Dory
line: Huh. That’s a funny thing to promise.

name: Dory
line: Well, you can’t never let anything happen to him. Then nothing would ever happen to him... Not much fun for little Harpo.

name: Dory
line: I think he says we’ve stopped.

name: Marlin
line: Of course, we’ve stopped! Just stop trying to speak whale, you’re gonna make things worse. What is that noise?

name: Marlin
line: Oh, no! Look what you did! The water’s going down!! It’s going down!!

name: Dory
line: Hmm... I’d say it’s half full.

name: Dory
line: OK, that one was a little tougher. He either said we should go to the back of the throat or he wants a root beer float.

name: Marlin
line: Of course he wants us to go there!!! That’s eating us!!! How do I taste, Moby?! Huh?! Do I taste good?!;You tell him I’m not interested in being lunch!!!

name: Marlin
line: No!! No more whale!! You can’t speak whale!!!

name: Marlin
line: No, you can’t!!! You think you could do these things but you can’t, Nemo!!!

name: Dory
line: He says it’s time to let go!! Everything’s gonna be all right!!

name: Marlin
line: How do you know? How do you know something bad isn’t gonna happen?!

name: Dory
line: Look! Sydney! Sydney! Sydney!! Sydney again!!!

name: Marlin
line: You were right, Dory!! We made it!! We’re gonna find my son!!! Thank you, sir!

name: Dory
line: Wow! I wish I could speak whale.

name: Marlin
line: OK. All we gotta do is find the boat that took him.

name: Marlin
line: Come on, Dory. We can do this!

name: Peach
line: [yawns] Morning. It’s morning, everyone! Today’s the day!!! The sun is shining, the tank is clean and we are getting out of... [gasps] The tank is clean! The tank is clean!!!!

name: Gill
line: Boss must’ve installed it last night while we were sleeping.

name: Peach
line: The AquaScum 2003 is an all-purpose, self-cleaning… maintenance free salt water purifier… that is guaranteed to even extend the life of your aquarium fish.

name: Peach
line: The AquaScum is programmed to scan. Your tank environment every five minutes?!

name: Bloat
line: That’s it for the escape plan! It’s ruined!!

name: Nemo
line: Then what’re we gonna do about--

name: Gurgle
line: My nerves can’t take much more of this.

name: Bloat
line: What’re we gonna do when that little brat gets here?

name: Gill
line: Hold on!! I’m coming!! Swim down!! Come on, kid!! Swim down!!

name: Gill
line: Roll, kid!!! Lean!! Lean!! Go to the window!

name: Sherman
line: Whoops! That would’ve been a nasty fall.

name: Nemo
line: Gill!!! Don’t let me go belly up!

name: Nemo
line: Don’t let me go belly up!!

name: Gill
line: You won’t go belly up, I promise. You’re gonna be okay.

name: Dory
line: All right, do any of these boats look familiar to you?

name: Marlin
line: No, but the boat has to be here somewhere! Come on, Dory. We’re gonna find it.

name: Dory
line: I’m totally excited! [yawns] Are you excited?

name: Marlin
line: That’s not a duck. It’s a pelican!!! No!! I didn’t come this far to be breakfast!!!

name: Pelican
line: Hey, Nigel. Would you look at that?

name: Pelican 1
line: Sun’s barely up and already Gerald’s had more than he can handle.

name: Nigel
line: Yeah. Reckon somebody oughta help the poor guy.

name: Nigel
line: Well, don’t everybody fly off at once.

name: Nigel
line: All right, Gerald, what is it? Fish got your tongue? Love a duck!!!

name: Marlin
line: I gotta find my son Nemo!!!

name: Nigel
line: Nemo?! He’s that fish!! Y’know the one we were talking about!! The one that’s been fighting the whole ocean!! Hey, I know where your son..! Wait! Come back! Stop!

name: Nigel
line: I got something to tell you!

name: Nigel
line: OK. Don’t make any sudden moves. Hop inside my mouth if you want to live.

name: Marlin
line: Hop in your mouth? And how does that make me live?

name: Nigel
line: Because I can take you to your son.

name: Nigel
line: No. I know your son. He’s orange, he’s got a gimpy fin on one side..

name: Barbara
line: Darla, you’re uncle will see you now.

name: Sherman
line: All right, let’s see those pearly whites.

name: Darla
line: [roars] I’m a piranha. They’re in the Amazon.

name: Sherman
line: And a piranha’s a fish, just like your present!

name: Sherman
line: Must’ve left your present in the car, sweetie. I’ll go and get it.

name: Bloat
line: What’s happening? Why is he playing dead?

name: Gill
line: He’s gonna get flushed down the toilet!! He’s gonna get outta here!!

name: Marlin
line: What’s a "dentist"! What is that?! Nigel, get in there!!

name: Sherman
line: What the…?! Darla, sweetie, look out! Steady!

name: Sherman
line: Hold still! Easy! Hold still! It's all right! Nobody’s going to hurt you!

name: Sherman
line: Out with you! And stay out!!

name: Gill
line: Quick! To the top of Mt. Wannahockaloogie!!!

name: Sherman
line: Crikey?! All the animals have gone mad! [grunts]

name: Gill
line: Sharkbait. Tell your dad, I said hi.

name: Gurgle
line: Is he gonna be OK, Gill?

name: Gill
line: Don’t worry. All drains lead to the ocean.

name: Nigel
line: I’m... I’m so sorry. Truly, I am.

name: Marlin
line: Dory. If it wasn’t for you, I never even would have made it here. So, thank you.

name: Dory
line: Hey, wait a minute. Wait! Where are you going?

name: Marlin
line: It’s over, Dory. We were too late. Nemo’s gone and I’m going home now.

name: Dory
line: No. No, you can’t! Stop! Please don’t go away. Please? No one’s ever stuck with me for so long before. And if you leave, if you leave…I just, I remember things better with you. I do. Look, P. Sherman, 42..! Ugh! I remember it, I do. It’s there, I know it is because when I look at you, I can feel it. And, I look at you and… I’m home. Please. I don’t want them to go away. I don’t want to forget.

name: Marlin
line: I’m sorry, Dory, but I do.

name: Crab 1
line: Yeah, that’s it fella! Just keep on swimming, you got that.

name: Crab 2
line: Too right, mate! I got a live one here!!

name: Nemo
line: Excuse me. Are you all right?

name: Dory
line: No! I don’t know where I am! I don’t know what’s going on, I think I lost somebody but I can’t remember.

name: Nemo
line: It’s OK. I’m looking for someone too. We can look together.

name: Dory
line: Dad!! Wait a minute, is it your dad or my dad?

name: Dory
line: Dad!! Dad!! Oh. Syl-shi Sydney."P. Sherman, 42 Wallaby Way, Sydney." Nemo!!! It’s you!!! You’re Nemo!!!

name: Dory
line: Oh! You’re Nemo!! You were dead! I saw you! And then I, here you are! I found you! You’re not dead! And your father! Your father!!

name: Nemo
line: My father?! You know my father?! Where is he?!

name: Dory
line: This way! He went this way! Quick!!

name: Dory
line: Hey! Have you seen an orange fish swim by? It looks just like him!

name: Bernie
line: Yeah, I saw I'm, Bluey. But I’m not telling you where he went. And there’s no way you’re gonna make me!

name: Bernie
line: [screams] All right!!! I’ll talk!!! He went to the fishing grounds!!! [shrieks]

name: Marlin
line: Sorry. Just trying to get home.

name: Marlin
line: Thank goodness!! It’s all right, son! It’s gonna be OK.

name: Fish 1
line: Turn around! You’re going the wrong way!!

name: Nemo
line: Dad! I know what to do!!

name: Nemo
line: We have to tell all the fish to swim down together!

name: Marlin
line: No, I am not gonna lose you again!!

name: Nemo
line: Dad, there’s no time!! It’s the only way we can save Dory! I can do this!

name: Marlin
line: You’re right. I know you can.

name: Nemo
line: Tell all of the fish to swim down!!

name: Marlin
line: Well!? You heard my son?! Come on!

name: Nemo
line: Dory! We have to tell everybody to...!

name: Marlin
line: ...Swim down together!! Do you understand what I’m saying to you?! Swim down!!

name: Nemo
line: Come on! You have to swim down!!

name: Marlin
line: Down!! Swim down!! Swim down!! Swim down!!

name: Marlin
line: Don’t give up!! Keep swimming! Just keep swimming!! That's it!!!

name: Marlin
line: Come on!! Let’s get to the bottom!! Keep swimming!!

name: Dory
line: [singing] Just keep swimming, just keep swimming...

name: Marlin
line: Nemo? Nemo? It’s OK. Daddy’s here, daddy’s got you.

name: Marlin
line: Oh, no, no, no. I’m so sorry, Nemo. Hey, guess what?

name: Marlin
line: Sea turtles? I met one! And he was a 150 years old.

name: Nemo
line: ‘Cause Sandy Plankton said they only live to be a 100.

name: Marlin
line: Sandy Plankton? Do you think I would cross the entire ocean and not know as much as Sandy Plankton?! He was a 150! Not 100! Who is this Sandy Plankton who knows everything wrong?

name: Marlin
line: Time for school!! Get up! Let’s go!! Go! I’m gonna win!!

name: Nemo
line: No, you’re not! I did it!!

name: Marlin
line: So just then, the sea cucumber looks over to the mollusk and says: With fronds like these, who needs anemones?

name: Bob
line: But seriously, Marty, did you really do all the things you say you did?

name: Anchor
line: We just wanna make sure that our newest member got home safe.

name: Chum
line: Keep up with the program, Dory.

name: Mr. Ray
line: Hold on! Here we go!! Next up, knowledge!

name: Nemo
line: Bye, Dad! Oh! Oh, Mr. Ray! Wait. I forgot something. Love you, Dad.

name: Nemo
line: Uh, Dad, you can let go now.

name: Marlin
line: Sorry! Now go have an adventure!

name: Nemo
line: See you after school, Dory! Bye, dad!!

name: Sherman
line: I don’t understand it. Here this thing has a lifetime guarantee and it breaks! I had to clean the tank myself, take all the fish out, put ‘em in bags and... Where’d the fish go? [car horns honking]

name: Bloat
line: Yeah, that’s it! You can do it!!

name: Peach
line: That’s the shortest red light I’ve ever seen!
